Guide to the Abram J. Abeloff Collection on Benjamin Franklin

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:09 -0400.

did.unittitle: Abram J. Abeloff collection on Benjamin Franklin
did.abstract: Abeloff's personal collection of mostly printed material on or by Benjamin Franklin. Includes biographies, The Works of Benjamin Franklin series, and Poor Richard's Almanac. Also contains 4 used checkbooks (1920-1935).
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.
